summary: Diff only updates the frontend build version constant to v27 and updates metadata/summaries; it does not show actual restoration of Version 27 backend/frontend code, migration work, or regression checklist validation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore the application code to match Version 27 exactly (backend + frontend), including Guest/Hotel/Admin pages/panels and dependent backend APIs.

A truncated summary file mentions many restored routes/pages, but the diff does not include those file content changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement a safe, conditional canister upgrade migration (backend/migration.mo) if schema/state layout differs so upgrades do not trap and prior data remains readable.
missing_requirements.reason: No backend files are added/modified in the diff summary, and there is no evidence of backend/migration.mo changes or any upgrade/migration logic.

missing_requirements.requirement: Run and pass the existing frontend regression checklist (frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md) focusing on auth/role navigation, panels, booking flows, and admin invite tokens.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes or results related to frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md are shown, and the diff provides no evidence of checklist execution or fixes driven by it.
evidence: <file-diff>: Modified files list does not include frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md
